parameters: \n<Velona>Alright, this ghost thing is going down.
\n<Velona>Alright, this ghost thing is going down.
\n<Velona>Alright, this ghost thing is going down.
In a place like this. Doesn't surprise me.
Maybe there is some omnee floating around here.
\n<Velona>Once this ghost is out of the way, I better take a
I was confident that Omnee was as good as mine!
Didn't expect to see anyone else down here.
\n<???>Oh, would you look who it is.
\n<???>My dear sister. What a pleasure to finally meet you.
\n<???>What a pleasure to finally meet you.
\n<Kishu>Hmm, she does kind of look like you.
\n<Velona>No no no, I don't have any siblings.
\n<???>I'm surprised it took so long for my successor to awaken.
\n<Velona>No...\. It can't be you can it...?
\n<Kishu>Um, Velona, what is going on exactly?
\n<Velona>I've heard stories about a defiant goddess when I
I didn't think I'd ever actually meet her.
\n<Velona>The person that's standing in front of us is my
\n<Velona>Not quite. I'm just a demigoddess that was "supposed"
\n<Aurora>Hmph, well at least someone remembers my name.
I need you to hand over that girl.
\n<Velona>What!? What do you need her for?
\n<Aurora>You can't fool me, you want all that omnee
\n<Aurora>The stuff that makes you, me, and that girl more than
\n<Aurora>Oh, so you really aren't joking huh.
\n<Aurora>It seems someone needs to work on their Omnee
\n<Aurora>That girl is filled to the brim with it.
\n<Aurora>1 whole kilogram of pure delicious omnicrystal, shoved right
where her heart used to be.
\n<Velona>I'll explain later, right now we have a fallen goddess to
\n<Aurora>To think that my successor is this incompetent.
\n<Aurora>Well, it should make the victory all the easier.
\n<Aurora>In case you're wondering, her omnicrystal core is
plated with osmiridum, making it undetectable by mortal tools and
They managed to stockpile a sizeable portion of omnicrystal
\n<Aurora>Saves me from having to scrounge for bit and pieces myself.
I could care less about the shell surrounding it.
\n<Aurora>I'd think twice before you even try to start something.
\n<Aurora>I'd be more than happy to let you breathe another day.
All you have to do is hand over the girl.
\n<Aurora>I may be fallen but I think you'd be
surprised just how much powerful I am.
\n<Aurora>No matter how you look at it, you're a novice compared to me.
\n<Aurora>Laughable, you really are a child compared to me.
\n<Velona>I haven't fought anyone or anything this strong in ages.
Let alone a pseudo-deity like Aurora...
\n<Velona>If we run we're gonna get blasted anyways so we may
It's 2 versus 1, so we kinda have an advantage...?
\n<Velona>Yeah, I have no idea just how strong Aurora is.
\n<Velona>Worse case scenario, we get the EFF out of here.
\n<Velona>Yeah. We've decided to fight you head on.
\n<Aurora>Just be prepared to be wiped off the face of this planet!
I'm sorry...\. I wasn't...\. strong enough.
\n<Aurora>UGH. I didn't think you could drag on for this long.
Tossing all those crazy spells without full goddess power must
\n<Velona>You're done Aurora... I'd kill you right now but I'm
\n<Aurora>This won't be last time you see me.
\n<Aurora>And I WILL kill you and your little android friend.
I actually thought I was going to die for a moment there...
You must have had it way worse than me.
\n<Kishu>I think I can feel my joints locking up...
\n<Velona>Just hold on a bit longer, c'mon let's get outta
\n<Velona>Oh man... Rustic Vysio is right in spitting distance...
\n<Velona>We could go back to my house but screw Kuroi Woods...
\n<Velona>Ugh... Better just stop by the inn for now...
